task.summary: Initial commit of shell provided for class
Added Square, Rectangle, Line, Circle and Ellipse drawing features.
Added Square, Rectangle, Line, Circle and Ellipse drawing features.
Added triangle drawing feature. Part 1 complete - ready for passoff - I think
Adjusted code to better match the spec.
All shapes stored as per Lab2 spec (center based)
All shapes drawing using Affine Transformations
4 of 6 shape types selectable - can change colors of existing shapes.
Add Outlines and start of dragging capabilities
Handles always appear on top of all shapes
All lab2 functionality - selecting, rotating, translating all shape types.
Lab3 Partial - Rectangles, Ellipses, Squares, and Circles resizing.
Lab3 All Shapes resizing. Needs fix for deselect bug
Lab3 Fixes deselect bug. Needs fix for line shifting and rect jitter
Lab4 Scrolling and Zooming implemented, but doesn't affect drawing
